title: Rebel
description: The latest from USA Today Bestselling and Award-winning author Carmen Caine:  Revenge. I understand it now. The ice-cold soul. The single-minded focus. The strength it provides. My name is Cassidy. Cassidy Edwards. And I'm the first of my kind.  The Job:  Investigating a prison break in the Nether Reaches.  The Players: A warlock who doesn’t know he has a secret—but I do. A mysterious, golden-masked figure controlling the Knights Templar from behind the scenes. A new family member who wants nothing more than my head on a silver platter.  The Curveball: A Nether Reach investigation rips me from the arms of love and sets me firmly on the cold path of revenge that threatens to consume my very soul.
author: Carmen Caine
